episodes.title: A King Is Born
episodes.plot: Eric & Hannibal are back! Eric welcomes Judy Greer and Adam Rippon, and befriends a lost rat on the subway, trying to find its original owner. Also - beer chugging musical guest Anderson Six.Paak!

episodes.title: Hannibal Quits
episodes.plot: After only one and a half episodes, Hannibal quits the show and is poorly cloned into a giant mutant version of himself named Blannibal.

episodes.title: You Got Served
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Omarion and celebrity psychic Tyler Henry and feeds bugs to musical guest Machine Gun Kelly. Eric transforms into the Bench Mensch, a Jewish bench who helps people move.

episodes.title: Lizzo Up
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Dermot Mulroney and Diane Guerrero with overweight musical guest Joey Bada$$. Lizzo debuts a surprise spinoff show.

episodes.title: The A$AP Ferg Show
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Mercedes Javid and Brenda Song and punishes Grimes. He also gives his dead boss some ranch!

episodes.title: Blannibal Quits
episodes.plot: Blannibal has had enough of the show and quits. too. Eric gets into a dangerous situation with an organized crime associate. Eric and co-host Lakeith Stanfield welcome Tiffany Pollard and Naya Rivera with musical guest Big Freedia.

episodes.title: Named After My Dad's Penis
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Luis Guzmán and Tia Carrere. Felipe Esparza hangs out. Mike Penis returns with a guest list of his own. JPEGMAFIA, Lil Yachty, MURS, Trippie Redd, and Zack Fox on a new Rapper Warrior Ninja.

episodes.title: Bone TV
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Robin Givens, Cleopatra Coleman and Jai Rodriguez with musical guest Toro y Moi. Bone TV gets nasty.

episodes.title: Is Your Wife Still Depressed?
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Quincy and Chad Johnson. Rapper Warrior Ninja guests Fat Tony, Freddie Gibbs, OG Swaggerdick and CUCO. Ranch it up guy gets a job. Felipe hovers over the guests.

episodes.title: The 50th Episode!
episodes.plot: Eric welcomes Blake Griffin and Stormy Daniels in the season finale. His crossing guard skills stink and Miss Eric Andre will be finally crowned.
